Title: Zero should be Grey, not Red.
Review: I quite enjoy using SC mobile app but I am sure there are many ways to improve further. One suggestion: the color of the figures should be grey instead of red when the figure is zero. Because red signify there is outstanding but when it is zero, why is it red?? Just a humble suggestion.

Title: Card details should be made more accessible!
Review:
Can we just agree that the card detail that requires so many clicks to access just simply does not make any sense???

It has all the important info we need to check from time to time, such as, 1.Available limit, 2. Payment due date etc. Do we really need to click into the transaction history of the card before we can check all the info regarding the card details? Can we not make the button accessible right beside the card after login?

Title: Problem after update
Review: Don’t receive the “approve” after updated to the latest version, was not able to retrieve e-statement for payment!

Title: Why forcing to update?
Review: Opened the app just to get the PIN and forced to update the app. Did not have internet connection so could not do anything.

Title: Difficult to use OTP
Review: A bank with good service but need to upgrade the app, especially for iPhone. I can’t see the OTP after login as the message is long and does not fully display to take note of the number. So when I try to copy the OTP number from the message and then try to paste it, the app gets reset and need to log in again!

Title: Totally awful
Review: Someone must experience other banks or retailers’ app experience. Worst!!! E.g., App update should not be a default step to sign off online bank in computer. Such a simple thing makes a big difference in user experience!

Title: Face recognition
Review: Still no face recognition except Touch ID. I cannot even disable Touch ID now.

Title: It is a dud
Review: I don’t want to use worst to describe this app. It is a dud absolutely. Without any consideration of what users will suffer from it. Today again, you need a code to deal with but the app not allow you to approve. The only reason is force you to upgrade silly functions I am not interested at all. Why you release a half cooked dud and forbid to use the tokens at the very begging and after this can work finally. You made another bug to disturb your customers.

Title: Bug in latest version
Review: Updated to latest version but cannot login, keep asking me to upgrade to the latest version but it is already the latest version

Title: Forced to update app
Review: I’m just trying to log in but now I’ve to update my app before I can do anything.

Title: Cannot open the app
Review: When I tried to launch the app, it keep on showing me “upgrade now” and when I click that button to the App Store, it shows “open” which means the app already upgraded. So it is a vicious cycle that I can NEVER open the app! Help !!!

Review:
Even though I have updated the app but still seeing update option on login screen.
This is so annoying.... force update and then this option doesn’t disappear even the app the updated

Title: Let me use the app

Title: Please don’t force to update app
Review: Please don’t force to update app. The update haven’t shown up and the app was unusable

Review: SCB prompts me to update the app, in AppStore it’s update but when opening the app it still shows the prompt, so I cannot use the app

Title: Face ID is not working at all
Review: When I was using Touch ID on the older iPhones, it works flawlessly. Now I switch to the new no button iPhone, using Face ID even though I got a tick meaning face is verified, before the tick comes out, it says verification failed or something similar. Always have to key in username and password to Mobile banking. Very irritating and frustrating. Other banking apps are already compatible with Face ID so what is standard chartered doing?

Title: Face ID
Review: Pls update your app to allow Face ID

Title: Pretty starting screen
Review: The opening screen is pretty, but that as far as I manage to get on the app as it always hangs there

Review: App is not working at all. I cannot do any banking transaction (without logging into the mobile app), which is not working! The app just launch and hangs. No error message, no prompts, no nothing! Can the development team actually do some testing before pushing out the updates!

Review:
OTP sms comes 2 hours late.

bank doesn't keep promises about the application promotions.

Too many complications, stay away!

Title: App not updated

Title: Doesn’t work mate

Title: Not supporting Face ID
Review: The app is not supporting Face ID as login method.

Title: Transaction showing unsuccessful, but deduct the amount from my account
Review: I used their mobile apps to do an online transaction to a merchant, the apps showed me transaction unsuccessful but I receive a message show that amount have been deducted from my account. Then I call in to customer service, and they said they can’t do anything to solve the issue. What kind of service and what kind of lousy Apps SC has developed.

Review:
The app doesn’t reflect actual statement balances, it shows up right in the online banking or from purchasing power in the trading app, but not in the mobile app.

Makes you wonder about the quality, consistency and stability of their whole banking platform...

Title: No support for Face ID
Review: Possible to add in Face ID support for this apps?

Title: iPhone XS MAX
Review: The app shows Touch ID instead of Face ID. Uninstalled and reinstalled a few times, never solve the issue. Please kindly update

Title: Good app
Review: Simple and easy to use. SC MOBILE KEY is very convenient.

Title: Keeps crashing every time I click login.
Review: Keeps crashing every time I click login. Could not evaluate JavaScript error - what a waste of time.

Title: Cannot register for internet banking token at all!
Review:
Cannot register for mobile banking at all!
Why link the internet token to an app.
Can’t even register for it through this app.
Can’t transfer money.

Title: Apps not robust
Review: When one tried to enable the sent notification, it spin forever & cannot get out from the apps. If that is the case how can one be sure that system is secured & robust since it freeze & one cannot logon.

Title: 7.1.1 blocks jailbreaks.
Review: FYI jail breakers.

Title: Suggestions
Review:
Was automatically converted to receiving electronic statements instead of my usual paper statements for a few months now.

1) had a hard time submitting claims to my company for specific monthly spendings. Reason being my name did not appear together with the transaction(s). Tried both app and web version of statements but both versions did not list my name together with the transaction. Will be unable to submit my claims without this. Please change this and fast. Else i’d be forced to use the service of other banks instead.

2) Had a really difficult time searching through the app just to view my monthly statements. Suggest to make this easier if you want us users to stick with using electronic statements.

3) 60 days worth of transaction history is totally insufficient. Hope it will get increased to 12 months, or the bare minimum of 6 months.

4) option to receive paper or electronic monthly statements.
This option was not included in your app. Hope it will get included in your new version.

Thanks.

Title: I cannot log in!
Review:
I cannot recall this bug existed but it has been quite some time since I was able to login to the app and view my finances or make any transactions (through the app). This is very inconvenient especially pple on the move and all the more unstable when you factor in the app’s role in authenticating the login from the web.
Able to expedite this fix? Anyone facing a similar problem, those using iPhone 10 with the latest OS?

Title: Please update the app with Face ID function ASAP
Review:
Ever since I changed my phone to iPhone X I have to literally key in my account ID and password every time I login! This is so annoying!!!!

Please update the app with Face ID ASAP!!!

Title: is this a glitch?
Review: I have been trying to log into the app with my user id but it says device registered under another user. But i can log in through Safari. Why?

Title: Frustrating app
Review:
Doesnt work even after calling and reloading twice. 
Since this is the only mobile authenticating key, 
No way to do online banking so expect fines for overdue payments since I can’t access my cash. 
Wasted 1 hour already trying to log in. 
Reloaded app showed the ‘approve’ notification, but after clicking it - the online banking doesn’t register it and its back to square one. 

Even posting this is a problem. All unhappy words for nicknames have been taken.

Title: Crashing for the new update
Review: The latest update keep crashing on my iPhone.

Title: Best ever Banking app to use without holding any token , card or sms verification
Review:
One of the best banking app 
Never fail me except maintenance time 
User friendly 
First ever all cards to pay which is one of the reason I chose to use years back 
Impressive layout and feature 
Upgrading to be better

Title: SC new app
Review: Easy to access.. better than older version... able to view transactions immediately...transaction data  update really awesome...

Title: Super Excellent App :)
Review: I love the new app. Excellent user experience and beautiful UI, easy to use. Cool Pre-Login, Soft token, Touch ID features are mind blowing.. Kudos to the dean who developed this app. Great work guys!

Title: Upgrading & Upgrading & Upgrading...still the same
Review: Always upgrading in the middle of the day where people need to use the app. If it is so essential to do upgrading work consider doing it later of the night. Encounter the upgrading numerous times in the middle of the day. Eventually after upgrading still the same. Is security even better?

Title: Crash and crash and crash
Review: Terrible.

Title: Good app with great visuals
Review: SC mobile key provided great convenience in all my banking transactions

Title: Positive Experience
Review: Positive experience with the mobile app. User friendly app that helped me in getting all my banking errands done. No longer need to visit the branch. Doesn’t require me to keep a token as they have finger print authentication.

Title: Terrible user experience
Review: I am disappointed with this app. It’s hard trying to log in on my iPad....had the app open on my registered device (mobile) to approve the login request via my ipad, and no approval request came through on my mobile despite resending the approval notification several times. The previous app was far better in terms of user experience.

Title: Awesome App
Review: SC Mobile has been greatly improved with new interface. SC Mobile Key has made login a Breeze by removing manual otp.

Title: Buggy PayNow keep asking for SC Mobile Key
Review: Please fix this sub-application as I cannot use PayNow service now. Despite receiving SMS OTP, the app ended up with a blank screen and no response. How to use PayNow service like that?

Title: App hangs regularly
Review: The app hangs regularly. Need to delete n download again n redo the settings.

Title: Worst ever
Review: Unable to view details on the app after log in! Have to open browser to view details! Please rectify

Title: Break right after for update.
Review:
Ya right. Moving to virtual token to save money for your SMSes but your virtual token doesn't even work. What the point. I rather stick with physical token then. 

To add, The screen moves so? Does it give any advantage?

Title: VinayDixit
Review: This is an excellent banking application I have ever used.

Title: Completely unusable after update
Review: After the update, can't perform key functions like transfer between own accounts, see own payment and transaction history. When transferring between own account, even though all fields are filled, the "Next" button is still disabled with no hints indicating what I did wrong. A complete empty payment and transaction history when obviously there are. I would prefer there be no updates then to see core functions breaking like this.

Title: One of best Mobile Banking Apps out there
Review: I have a lot of bank accounts across multiple countries and this is one of the most intuitive apps out there with gorgeous album art and simplistic functions interface.

Title: Best banking app ever!
Review: Banking is less boring now with SC Mobile. I especially like the personalization functionality within the app.

Title: Feature
Review: Need capability to modify scheduled payments

Title: Very good banking app
Review:
The UI is much better than it used to be and authentication is much easier than in most other banking apps. Quick access to balances and transaction history is super handy, as well as the push notifications. You can do everything you might need to straight from the app - make payments, block and replace your cards, instantly reset your PIN, etc. 

After logging in the menu structure is strange though - no section for cards... ?? 2 separate sections for payments and transfers is very confusing as a customer - which means most of those great features are buried and hard to find. The payment flow is clunky, and everything is slow to load.

Title: Great App
Review:
Great App and amazing experience.
Loved the new personalised version with good graphics , personalised and changes with time of day ..

Title: Good improvement
Review: The recent change to the app is a good innovation and allows me to add layers without the token. Good job!

Title: Excellent App
Review:
Easy navigation, better control and better experience... 

I can't ask for more.

Title: Great Application
Review: Great mobile banking application, innovative features

Title: Very intuitive and good
Review: Great app!

Title: Intuitive and easy to use
Review: Happy to find that I can set up account transfer payee directly on the mobile app and make instant transfer. Would be nice if I can change transfer limit directly on mobile too though, as I had to go to web version to change that now.

Title: Brilliant User Experience
Review: Fantastic app, works like charm with great user experience.

Title: Really bad user experience
Review: The app gets stuck at the splash screen forever  with the slow moving video. This is the Worst version ever or any banking app that I've used so far.

Title: The worst banking app ever
Review: This is the worst banking app & website I’ve ever experienced. When I registered, the information of my accounts reflected on the bank app was incomplete. I msg my RM to check & he said he could see it on his system but not reflected in my online account. Then miraculously it appear after a few days. Today I set up a new payee in my account. For 10mins I tried to transfer to new payee via Fast & it prompted that I have no such payee. I was forced to transfer via standard transfer (as that’s where the payee is reflected) which will take 2-3 days for payee to receive. Then after the standard transfer was made, I went into Fast transfer and there it was, the account is shown. I’ve never had such a Long lapse of time between creating a new payee and it showing up much later with any other banks. Who in the world wants to make Standard transfer nowadays? Why do they even have this option? Ridiculous!

Title: SC Mobile key page does not load
Review: SC Mobile key page does not load. None of services work as I am unable to enter the key.

Title: Key Verification page blank
Review:
After upgrading, now I can't do any transaction thru mobile app
Login is successful, can see home page
But when I want to see details or make transactions, normally there is Key Verification page which I can enter the passcode set before

But now this page showing  white blank screen, please help to solve the issue

It's so troublesome that I only can do using web login, thank you

Title: Rubbish
Review:
Utter rubbish application. You need to generate a password on the mobile app in order to view online statements, but the mobile app keeps either timing out or not processing a password.

Downloaded the mobile app several times to no avail. And to imagine the people who developed this app were probably rewarded richly.

Title: Excellent UI , quick to access features!
Review:
Well done ! The app looks pretty cool and feature rich. One touch access to balances and transactions is convenient and gives choice for customisation. The new notification hub and inbox is perfect as I don’t really have to scramble through my sms messages for tracing any notifications.

The soft token works pretty smooth and makes login and 2fa a jiffy and add to it the offline pin is only making it better.

All in all the app is a great step ahead and looking for more !!

Title: Very slow like hell
Review:
The app is very slow please do something for this.

Please checkout citi bank app and learn something from it.

Hope somebody can look into it... today my i phone 8 plus software upgrade to iOS 11.4.1..
Totally the Sc mobile apps cannot be open... there is an error message..

Review: Unable to login after updating iOS 11.4.1

Review: Keeps getting an error at the start screen - a secure connection cannot be established - and the app quits. Tried logging in from a browser but it requires authentication from the app.. which quits.. physical tokens are a thing of the past my foot.. perhaps a relationship with this bank should be what’s past..

Title: App can’t be used after Latest update

Title: Clearly disappointing
Review: What a disappointment. Expect much better digital capability from StanChart. The app is not even working properly. The design is terrible. Make people wonder how can anyone design such poor quality banking app. I think the bank need to rethink and beef up its mobile banking

Banking services cannot be so unstable.

Title: Can not login

Title: Anybody able to Login?
Review: Trying to Login for past 15-20mins. After a while getting no internet connection error message!! Other Apps are working fine!

Title: Cry me a river
Review: Was excited that your app finally got a cool interface but seriously, logging in was a total b***h. How come so laggy one.

Title: Try harder
Review: You know, some people actually travel and they want to take their SCB credit cards with them with the hope that they can use it while they are overseas. But this app kills all hope because the bloody links in the app just don’t work no matter how hard you press on them. Even if you press your screen in, you’re out of luck! Fix it for God’s sake!!!!

I tried to re-download many times and subsequent to registering the PIN, the screen would just freeze, before crashing seconds later. As I tried to re-open the app, it would just crash again and no way to even enter the app unless I reinstall.

What good is a mobile banking app when you can’t even open it?! Fix this!!!

Don’t like the latest version. It look nice and fancy but LACK practicality.

Why update a well design apps to such a crappy new update? It ain broken don’t change it!

Review: There seems to be many bugs on this mobile app. Initially they force you to register for a mobile token but after several times of uninstalling and reinstalling of the mobile app, it still doesn’t work. Subsequently, there is a bug in that the OTP cannot be sent to the registered mobile number. Sad to say, I think the bank probably need a better system in place to avoid such problems which cause much inconvenience to their clients.

Review:
The two updates on 1st and 4 Jun rendered the app useable as there was no way to log in ... just seeing the videos and SCB logo. Wonder if developer tested app with required IOS version before release? 

Lastest update V7.08 resolved the issue ... finally. Good to see useful features which user can turn on/off .. would be nice to be able adjust font size and have faster loading and log in.

Review: App keep closing by itself after recent update. Can u pls do something about it? It was working perfectly fine before the recent upgrade.

Title: Can’t load after update...

Title: Worst banking app and customer experience ever!!
Review:
Just opened my account when Bank transitioned to new ‘sc mobile key’ to replace security tokens. You need to click approve in the app to add new payees and other functions. It’s for extra security and the bank saves money by eliminating tokens.

This has been dysfunctional with error messages popping up in the app. ‘Known issue’ customer service said and its been ‘escalated’. It’s been 3 days!! Second time it’s happened with the second payee I’ve added in over a month. 

I can’t move money out of my own account!
I had an urgent payment missed and I suffer the consequences. It’s my worst customer experience ever!

Title: Stupid update!!
Review: Updated the apps and it cannot even load!! And I can't even login using browser as request to generate offline pin via mobile app!!! STUPID!!!! Test before roll out!

Title: App keeps crashing!
Review: Forced me to upgrade the app and it crashed every single time I opened it! And I can’t do any emergency transfers! Please fix it!

Title: App crashed after recent update
Review: App crashed every time i tried to open it on iPhone X after the recent interface update for the past weeks. Been waiting for the patch but it didn't happen. Can SC look into it urgently? I am not able to do any transactions on my mobile at all.

Title: Update but can’t launch

Title: Crashing on iOS 11.4

Title: Unable to use app

Title: Don’t understand
Review: I updated the app but it still kept on asking me to update the app before it lets me use it. I don’t understand

Title: Currency converted amount details at mobile app missing
Review: Hi, I used to be able to see the converted currency details in the past. The new app is not showing the details. I strongly suggest the bank to improve and make it better rather than make it worst user experience with new app version.

Title: latest update keeps crashing
Review:
i do one transaction and the app crashes... i had 7 crashes in the last 5 mins while using it... clearly not an improvement this update. 
The app itself is good. if it works;)

Title: Poor interface and setup
Review: Frustrating layout and UI... I keep getting logged out of my banking when on the website as I have to go to my phone to get an OTP, but then face recognition on the iPhone X kicks in which logs me into the phone app and then out of the website... way behind DBS offering which is much slicker

Title: App crashes

Title: Apps is dead
Review: Prompt me to update. But there isn’t anything to update as I had already updated. Can’t use the app at all.

Title: Finger print error
Review: After upgrade my finger print log in not working

Title: App Crashed
Review: The app has been crashing since the last update on iOS 11.3.1. Please do something about it

Title: Very bad online banking experience
Review: I like the previous app interface, it is more user-friendly than this new update, i was proud to have an SC account before i even told my sister and friends that it is very easy to use but now aside from very hard to find atms, online banking also get very hard to use so i may switch to other banks soon

Title: BAD
Review: Already upgraded and still prompt me to upgrade app -.-

Title: Upgraded but not able to use the app
Review: The app has been upgraded on 27th May , go to app store and then click open app , says upgrade , then after that can’t log in again .

Title: The best App ever ❤️
Review: Really save time for ppl who always need to do transaction online. Good Job and thanks for what you have done for us.

Title: Worst move by SC to date
Review: Stupid move by SC to require installing an app to do simple tasks! Listen SC... I DO NOT WANT A BANKING APP ON MY PHONE. Just let me bank in peace without your stupid app pleaseeee. It's one thing to register a mobile number for OTP, but it's pure stupidity to require an obsolete 100MB app installed on my limited-space phone just to access my online banking page and make transactions on my desktop.

Title: SC mobile key
Review: It has been fine until it calls to download the SC mobile key. It takes forever to register so I closed it. I tried to load the app then it crashes and I cannot enter. Must delete the app & download again before I can log in. Pls look into this issue & fix it ASAP.

Title: Still unable to register for mobile token
Review: Still unable to register for mobile token! Please fix it before the due date.

Title: Horrible app
Review: New updates are so buggy, keyboard keeps popping up when pressing any button but you can't use it for input

Title: Crash to Screen
Review: Badly built app. Ever since the new update it just doesn’t open up at all & crashes back to the iPhone main screen.

Title: App is not working
Review: The app does not work in iOS 11.3.1

Title: Please do something.
Review: Not stable. Always crush.

Title: Wipe and view option
Review: It would be better if they have a "swipe and view" option instead of logging in just to check your balance. It is more convenient that way. Otherwise, app is okay.

Title: Improvements needed
Review:
I compare this to the DBS ibanking app which gives a better user experience. SCB, you need to step up!!

1) Pls break up the credit card transactions per billing period, so that i can tell at a glance without having to log in to the website to download my estatement! Or alternatively, allow me to view my estatements from the app!!

2) For transactions, pls indicate the foreign amount AND equivalent Sgd amount. Right now, i still have to go to sc website to download estatement and be able to see this info 🙄

3) Speaking of website, after opening statement of one billing period, i have to log in all over again to view another month!?! At least open the statement in another tab so that i can seamlessly open another one. I use my smartphone to do all these, so pls improve the experience for mobile users!!

Title: FaceID doesn't work
Review:
New version doesn't handle face ID on IPHONE X. And can't paste my secure password into the box either. So I need to set a short and insecure password to use this?
And app support link doesn't connect. Total incompetence

Title: Very nice
Review: And triple wow. The new features are  life saver. Tired of poking and squinting my eyes and adjusting angles just to read the digits shown in card token. Digital key is amazing.

Review: This application is so difficult to use.

Review: After the recent update i cant even log in

Title: Lousy new APP
Review:
Just tried to register n it just hangs there.
Now I cant go into the Banking App at all. It opens n go off. Open n go off. Very unstable.

Title: Keeps Logging Out
Review:
I do appreciate the move towards an app-based OTP instead of the use of tokens. 
However the app does keep logging off after a couple of actions, be it approving a log-on or a new payer etc. 

After I have been away for a while it may also prompt that the device configuration has changed and require a mobile key registration again. This, while I am certain that I did not change any of the app configuration. 

Also, when authorising a new payee or transfer, I need to prompt the system via my PC browser twice before I get to the mobile key screen on my app. A minor bugbear but it should be sorted out.

Title: Infinity update
Review: The scb app is up to date in my phone. Still keep asking to update.

Title: Update has made it worse
Review:
25-Apr-2018

After the update, I'm unable to see my CC transactions anymore. Every time I click on my card, it keeps asking for my PIN and comes back to the main page. Disappointing!

Title: I like the revamped version
Review: Well done, the revamped version is totally new from the old version. I like the interface.

Title: Worst possible UI
Review:
I will pay to meet the genius who designed the UI and give them a piece of my mind. I’m no UI designer myself but it looks downright horrible compared to any app from the competition.
We are talking about a bank which has tonnes of resources to develop a decent app; but no, they will keep those dollars for their fat bonus packages.
I might switch back to DBS just because of this horrible app of SC.

Title: It just works
Review:
Not sure what all the fuss is about
The app works well 
Haven’t had any issues on my iPhone X, even previously on my iPhone 7
I would suggest all to update to the latest version and also to keep you iPhone up to date. People are complying about not being able to see the due date and no reminder. This is your responsibility. If you don’t pay your bills on time, that your fault, not the bank. Paperless, yes, save the damn earth, one little step at a time.

Title: 3.5 stars tbf, decent after update
Review:
Oh yes finally moving on with the times. (Size 48 fonts anyone? Lol)

Pretty impressive UI although I question the need to see your records without logging in. It's a fancy feature if you have nothing much better to update already but compared to the fact that until today statements are still hidden instead of being easily accessible (maybe see how citi does it?), this should have been wayyyyyy below the to-do list.

Also the confirmation bar is the old one! Very ugly la Aiyo. Nonetheless, keep moving towards this direction and I'm sure you guys will catchup with the top dogs soon. Until then, 3.5 stars!

Title: Refreshing!
Review: Amazing updates! Mobile Key, Lite mode up front!

Title: SC Mobile
Review: Awesome app! Very intuitive! No longer do I need the Hard Token. Kudos to the team who developed this!

Title: Foreign currency transactions
Review:
What’s the use of displaying just the foreign amounts and not together with the SGD equivalent in the card transactions history? 

Please fix this.

Review: Very bad UI for iPhone 7 Plus

Title: Resolution

Title: Cannot load.
Review: It does not work.

Title: Bad ... really bad ... waste my time installing
Review: I read all the negative reviews, couldn’t believe it installed on iphone 6S+, was only greeted by the “Welcome to SC Mobile Banking formally  Breeze Mobile” ... waited for 3 min... still the same screen !!! Uninstalled within 5min after installation!!! Still have some faith, installed on iPhone 5, same fate!!! Totally disappointed with SC putting up such inferior mobile app despite the negative feedback!

Title: Ridiculous compared to the competition
Review:
I hope someone from SCB is reading this. This app was great when it was first launched, now it’s just feels slow
The transfer interface is on a separate interface now which slows down the selection of accounts and therefore the whole process of transferring funds.

In addition, after several months of the IPhone X launch, SCB is still unable to fully utilize the full screen capabilities of the iPhone X.

If every other bank in the street is able to update their app timely and to provide a seamless transfer of funds interface. Why can’t SCB??? I not asking for you to top the competition, but please, just at least follow the pack.

Title: Very Disappointing
Review:
Poor UI Quality
still waiting for iPhone X resolution support.

Review:
- can’t check history.
- transaction not accurate at all.
- fail user interface.
Basically an app that doesn’t work. 
Those who give 5 starts review Most likely is developer team themself...

Title: iPhone X
Review: Doesn’t work on iPhone X

Title: Bad UI
Review:
Multiple empty updates to add “FaceID” which has been working since day 1?

Badly optimised for iPhone 6 and above, font size and interface overly large. Designed for an aging population or what?

Still not optimised for iPhone X screen after 2 months despite multiple updates which change nothing.

To and From fields should be swapped in funds transfer. No other bank does it this way around.

Title: iPhone X resolution please.
Review:
Please update the app so it’s full screen on iPhone X and thanks for Face ID! Though it worked just fine haha

So many updates but doesn’t cater to the X resolution

Title: Lousy apps that keep detecting me iPhone as jailbroken but it's not
Review: The app keep saying it detect my iPhone is jailbroken and prevented me from using but the phone was not jailbroken at all. Now I can't even use it at all. Stupid

Title: Lack of iPhone X support
Review: The user interface still still not optimised for iPhone X, come on, even DBS and OCBC updated their app to fully support iPhone X display resolution in full screen.
